description: This file contains a tutorial and implementation code for creating a medical imaging analysis agent using a custom AI framework. It defines prompts, initializes an agent with specific tools, and includes example usage for analyzing medical images.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class representing an AI agent capable of processing prompts and images, with tools and models integrated.

classes.name: Gemini
classes.description: A class representing a specific AI model used for generating responses.

classes.name: DuckDuckGoTools
classes.description: A class providing web search capabilities for gathering medical literature and references.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method to generate and output a response from the agent based on a prompt and optional images.
